product_name: Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: The waterproof, breathable Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants with a 30" inseam deliver unbelievable stretch as they keep you dry on almost any outdoor activity. Dry.Q(TM) EVAP stretch polyester fabric accelerates evaporation for more breathability and comfort. Partial elastic waist provides a comfortable fit. Articulated knees aid in fit, allowing freedom of movement. Full-length side zippers aid venting and convenient on/off over boots. Cuff hems on the Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants are partially elastic and feature rip-and-stick tab adjustments.
short_description: The waterproof, breathable Mountain Hardwear Stretch Plasmic Rain Pants with a 30" inseam deliver unbelievable stretch as they keep you dry on almost any outdoor activity.
